name: epicurus
text: Ray is such a good friend that he stopped to give Mega-Water to Lyle.

name: ssddr
text: Recent studies suggest that mega water is 75% alcohol with an additional 25% alcohol.

name: unquotable
text: Mega water's what done make my pappy go blind.

name: epicurus
text: I'm going to try to prove your name wrong on this one.

name: i_love_kate
text: Epicurus leads the field in quoting people in everyday life.

name: connormc
text: Dude if Saint don't got him edged then I don't know what's what anymore

name: tonyhighwind
text: That is nonsense and noise.  Epicurus is Top Dogg in the field, there is no question.

name: epicurus
text:
I was quoting achewood instead of talking normally since before it was cool , dig? You look up an old WW1 propaganda poster and straight up there is my avatar next to some achewood quote, all old-style fonts and images, and the line "Quoting Achewood - For Freedom!" and hell of quotes falling onto the head of the Kaiser and straight up killing him.

That is what is up.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Did you hear him? He said that that is what is up!

name: mrectomy
text: A comment left by mrectomy was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by jyri00555, Orskasm, atticusonline, BrianNotBrian, grim)

name: ganymedeio
text: Proudly awarding this its hundredth chubby.

name: bhlaab
text: megawater is water that used to weigh down someones dick

name: tollschaft
text: Not just any water either, he gave Lyle MEGA-WATER!

name: likeiwassaying
text: i wanted to give this a chubby, but i already had.

name: turnabout
text: notice the MN gang sign in panel 10.

name: lizjones
text: Oh man. I totally missed that the first time!

name: m1st3rbl4ck
text:
crap, i totally missed that too~!

also, this is one of my favourite strips, because lyle throwing up spaghetti is just such a common thing.

name: catachresis
text: Me three. Damn, reading these comments is so bountiful and fruitful. My quick eyes miss things.

name: epicurus
text: Our people owe a great debt of honour to this ... "Turnabout"

name: godfatherofsouls
text: OHHH i thought he was typing on an air-keyboard, arms all nerdy like a t-rex.

name: werthog42
text: I just noticed that myself. First thought: Post it, and get megachubbies! Second thought: Somebody else has undoubtedly done so already. Third thought: you know by now.

name: coldfrog
text: This is some prime tag team improvising here - those underpants really get you in tune with everyone.

name: slalvation
text: THAT'S what that was! I thought he was doing some kind of nerdy zombie imitation.

name: unsentletter
text:
Oh!

O_O


W... wow.

name: apricotta
text:
Oh, so THAT's what Roast Beef's been doing with his hands!

Chubby.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ugh. your tite noticing puts me to shame. you have nice eyes. i want them for my collection.

name: fattypneumonia
text: Oh! So that's what Roast Beef was doing!

name: dogzilla
text: Look at the genius!

name: centipede_damascus
text: I checked it on the scale!

name: zefiel
text:
Did you notice that he says 'look at ME' while not making any hand gestures... and then says 'look at the GENIUS!' while gesturing right in front.

Conclusion, our dongs are not only vestigial, but a lot more stupid than the dongs of the past.

name: lolcatdeluxe
text:
"Lyle's in the garage, but he's throwing up spaghetti."

One of my favorite Achewood lines.

name: aliiis
text: Philippe's horror in that panel is exquisite .

name: hollis
text: It's awesome that Roast Beef repeats things when he gets panicky.

name: zefiel
text: In the few panels shouldn't Beef be still experiencing Zen like calm? They're acting pretty much like usual.

name: rodneystubbs
text: I figure that his calm will return when the balance around him is restored.  In the meantime, it is critical to correct this imbalance.

name: featurelessvoid
text: Mega-nerd powers, activate!

name: soilentshuggah
text: One of my all time favorite strips. Teodor's rambling and the Mega-water bit is classic.

name: darthemed
text: Philippe looks downright horrified in panels 7 and 8.

name: madrin
text: ray volunteers his enlightenment so lyle can wash the spaghetti and vomit out of his mouth. truly, he is a god among cats.

name: flipper_the_dolphin_bitch
text: Do you know what i realized? I realized that Teodor is US. Teodor is the Achewood reader. He goes along with stuff but isn't quite up to it, prone to nostalgia, needs t feel like he belongs, ruins the situation when given to much power, mostly a bit player. WE ARE TEODOR.

name: stuart
text: I gave this one a five just for panels 7 and 8. Hear that, other panels? It's not for you.

name: drskradley
text: I love how it went "basic disaster movie plot" and turned from "Teodor's going to make an ass of himself and everyone else" to "Teodor's only going to be picking up MORE paper clips and go MORE insane!  And if everyone finds out our secret, society will be destroyed!"  Although, this was also established earlier.  Blah, why do I speak at all.

name: morypcaina
text:
No need to be a sophisticate when you've got the Zen Weight a couple of inches in front of your rad chilies.

Besides, how many disaster movies have a guy dial his cell phone with it attached to his dong?

name: molesticide
text:
philipe's eyes go RIGHT to the junk

oh man CLASSIC

name: tbtabby
text: It's a little hard to ignore.

name: falseprophet
text: When the shit hits the fan, will YOU answer the call of the Mega-nerds?

name: xi
text: Some black beans indeed.

name: tagrineth
text: Notice Beef smiling two panels in a row (9 and 10), that's gotta be a first.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Mr. Bear: The keys are mine!

"As the departing soul says to the body, here goes nothing."

name: corpsey
text: I like that Roast Beef is using his underwear for its original purpose. No ball cancer for him.

name: roybotron
text: This is the first time I've ever noticed Roast Beef using punctuation marks to end sentences.

name: aparrish
text: Once again, Tim Berners-Lee nearly brings about the end of civilization as we know it.

name: inthewater
text: That last panel is one of my favourites ever.

name: nyl
text: Panels 7 8 are pure magic.

name: saturnbeads
text: Them's some black beans, alright.

name: caitskills
text: panels 7 and 8 just made me spit coffee onto my keyboard. and this is probably the third or fourth time ive read the entire...series? huh.

name: fuzzyshoo
text:
Mr. Onstad, in the strip previous to this Ray kept his right hand on his gut for the entire strip.

It's ok that you didn't do it again for this one. You are rad.
